description: A dashboard for monitoring a Windows Desktop/Gaming PC. Using Prometheus, wmi_exporter, and OhmGraphite.

targets.expr: (sum(wmi_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$instance"}) by (instance) - sum(wmi_logical_disk_free_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$instance"}) by (instance)) / sum(wmi_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$instance"}) by (instance) * 100

(sum(intelcpu_0_temperature_0) + sum(intelcpu_0_temperature_1) + sum(intelcpu_0_temperature_2) + sum(intelcpu_0_temperature_3) + sum(intelcpu_0_temperature_4) + sum(intelcpu_0_temperature_5) + sum(intelcpu_0_temperature_6) + sum(intelcpu_0_temperature_7)) / 8

title: Windows Desktop Overview
